mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.profession_id AS "professionId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", p.id AS "professioninfo.id", p.name AS "professioninfo.name"
LEFT JOIN professioninfo p ON p.id = a.profession_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classinfo( id, name, profession_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{professionId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE classinfo SET name = #{name}, profession_id = #{professionId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
